text: @realDonaldTrump U told @USNavy to shoot down Iranians who are joyriding circles around them?U understand no one has fired a shot? This sure won’t get you re-elected,of course with the plethora of #COVID19 aerosols ALL OVER @WhiteHouse,most of you won’t be here in November.U are surrounded by it.
